message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.ctrip.framework.apollo.portal.entity.bo.ReleaseHistoryBO' import. Should be before 'com.ctrip.framework.apollo.portal.environment.Env'.
Abbreviation in name 'DefaultMQService' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
WhitespaceAround: '{' is not preceded with whitespace.
